title: Katie Price back with ex Kris Boyson as she gushes over him and daughter Bunny

Katie Price has confirmed things are back on with her ex fiance, Kris Boyson, who she had dumped for toyboy builder Charles Drury.

The model and businesswoman, 41, posted a photo of personal trainer Kris, 30, with her daughter Bunny.

Five-year-old Bunny can be seen looking up adoringly at her mum's boyfriend, who beams back down at her, holding her in his arms.

They are two peas in a pod with their matching tracksuits.

Katie captioned the photo: "Love this picture of my Bunny boo and @krisboyson " along with a love heart emoji.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

This reveals things are back on with Katie and Kris, who recently reunited after Katie ditched Charles, 22, to go back to Kris.

But Katie's fans weren't convinced by the loved up display.

One wrote: "Aww cute, with this weeks Daddy".

(Image: Instagram)

"Thought he was dumped", said another.

"I thought she'd dumped him? Surely Kris is not going to open himself up to even more heartache", questioned a third.

"Those kids must be so confused !!! Men in men out", remarked a fourth.

Charles Drury came out with some explosive claims about Katie after their acrimonious split.

He's claimed they enjoyed booze and drug fuelled nights together where Katie would stay up for days after.

He also alleged Katie sleeps with famous married men, and rated her a measly 1/10 in the bedroom.

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

He also told The Sun that Kris threatened him and called him a "little boy".

Charles claimed Kris and five of his mates pulled up to the drive and were "shouting and giving it the big'un".

He said Kris threatened to break his legs, and that he ended up calling the police on them.
description: Katie Price is back together with her ex Kris Boyson and has gushed over a photo of him holding her daughter Bunny
